thread.title: Vistatec Appoints a Director of Sales
thread.title_full: Vistatec Appoints a New Director of Sales

author: Simon Hodgkins (Chief Marketing Officer)
title: Vistatec Appoints a Director of Sales
text:
Vistatec today announced that Suzanne Marie Frank has been appointed to the position of Director of Sales US North & South West. Frank (previously Business Development Director at Lionbridge & Acrolinx) has joined the United States team at Vistatec in her new position as Director of Sales US North & South West. In this new role Frank will help to continue to align Vistatec’s world-class innovation with industry leading business development practice and help to drive and extend the next generation of Vistatec’s market growth in the US markets.
“Suzanne Frank has an extremely strong track record of helping some of the world’s largest brands with their global strategies. We are delighted that Suzanne is joining the Vistatec team as we expand our US growth plans,” said Mark Flanagan, Executive Vice President, Vistatec.
"A successful business needs talented people. Our people come from all around the globe, drawing on many cultures, professions and backgrounds to work together to achieve our corporate goals and those of our clients. With people all over the world, Vistatec is growing fast as the demand for global content increases, Suzanne is an experienced Localization professional and we welcome the addition to the wider Vistatec team," added Flanagan.
Joining Vistatec Suzanne Frank commented that “organizations rely on content every day to create compelling experiences for their customers and Vistatec is recognized as a global leader in this industry with many top companies and brands working directly with Vistatec.”
About Vistatec:
We have been helping some of the world’s most iconic brands to optimize their global commercial potential since 1997. Vistatec is one of the world’s leading localization solutions providers. HQ in Dublin, Ireland with offices in Mountain View, California, USA.
Media contact:
Simon Hodgkins, CMO, Vistatec info(at)Vistatec(dot)com
About Suzanne:
“Suzanne is a trusted advisor on globalization and has guided worldwide teams on their plans and processes to achieve their global goals. She will be a tremendous asset to Vistatec, helping clients design and execute on their global strategy.”
Robin Emiliani Vice President, Marketing. Matrix Marketing Group.
“When it's time to focus on a new market, be aware of their business culture and prepare to go beyond English. The multinational game isn’t just for Fortune 500 companies anymore. Suzanne is in a great position to help globalize any brand."
June Hutchison, Owner of CustomerCentric Selling.
“Suzanne doesn’t just take your company global…she curates the entire process to ensure full engagement is generated and captured.”
Matt Clayman, Associate Director, Client Partnerships, Innovation Protocol.
